settings.heading: Get Stuck in on one of our courses

settings.event_title: A Spring Decorating Workshop at The Star, Alfriston
settings.event_intro: Be inspired in a fun and learning environment for the art of block printing with Molly Mahon and an addition of flower arranging with Julia Marsden, during your stay at the Star, the newest hotel in the Polizzi Collection
settings.event_description: Enjoy an eventful stay at The Star including one nights accommodation, breakfast, a three course diner with a glass of wine, drinks with Molly and Alex, both workshops, refreshments, all materials and a vase.

settings.event_title: Molly Mahon coming to Kings Road, London
settings.event_intro:
To celebrate London Craft Week 2022, Anthropologie is delighted to announce their partnership with British Textile Designer, Molly Mahon.
‘The Modern Block Printer’ Molly will be taking over the King’s Road Gallery from the 5th to the 15th of May. Celebrating her fascination in block printing and her love for Rajasthan, the gallery will feature an eclectic mix of block-printed designs. From homewares to fabric and wallpapers, she’ll create a world of colour and pattern, available to shop.
settings.event_description:
To celebrate the new artist in residence, on Thursday 12th May at Anthropologie King’s Road, journalist Cosmo Brockway will be in conversation with Molly Mahon. Joining her on the panel will be co-founder of fashion retailer East, Penny Oliver and British fashion
designer Lucinda Chambers as they discuss the art and history of block printing and how it’s used in the 21st Century.
settings.event_extras: Molly's Shop will be open from 5th to the 15th of May.  Monday - Saturday 10am - 7pm and Sunday 12pm - 6pm

settings.event_intro:
Join Molly for a one-day workshop at Ashbrook House near Banbury, experiencing the joy of block printing and making your own lampshade for your home. Using Molly’s carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern in the morning, and finish by printing your own 30cm lampshade in the afternoon with a delicious, organic lunch in between!
This course is suitable for all levels with no experience necessary.

settings.event_title: Block printing Linen tea towels at Thyme, Cotswolds
settings.event_intro: Join printmaker Molly Mahon for a two hour workshop experiencing the joy of block printing, inspired by her shared love of nature and the surrounding land at Thyme.
settings.event_description: Thyme, a beautifully restored Manor House & Farm in the Cotswolds. The workshop will include a welcome from Thyme followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s garden inspired hand carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing your own linen tea towel.
settings.event_extras: The price includes a welcome coffee and all materials.

settings.event_title: Block printing Cards & Envelopes at Thyme, Cotswolds
settings.event_intro: Join printmaker Molly Mahon for a two hour workshop experiencing the joy of block printing, inspired by her shared love of nature and the surrounding land at Thyme.
settings.event_description: Thyme, a beautifully restored Manor House & Farm in the Cotswolds. The workshop will include a welcome from Thyme followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s garden inspired hand carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing your own set of beautiful cards and envelopes.
settings.event_extras: The price includes a welcome coffee and all materials.

settings.event_title: Block Printing Lampshade Workshop at Charleston, Firle
settings.event_intro: Join Molly for a one-day workshop, experiencing the joy of block printing, designing and printing your own lampshade.
settings.event_description: The day-long course will include a private tour of the house, followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing and making your own lampshade.
settings.event_extras: The price includes all materials, refreshments and a delicious lunch

settings.event_title: Block Printing Cushion Workshop at Charleston, Firle
settings.event_intro: Join Molly for a one-day workshop, experiencing the joy of block printing, designing and printing your own cushion cover
settings.event_description: The day-long course will include a private tour of the house, followed by an introduction to block printing by Molly. Using Molly’s carved wooden blocks, you will experiment with colour and pattern and finish by printing your own 60cm x 40cm cushion.
settings.event_extras: The price includes all materials, refreshments and a delicious lunch.

settings.title: How about giving a workshop as a gift?

settings.event_title: Learn the art with Molly's Online Course
settings.event_intro: In this vibrant online course, Molly explores the fundamentals of block printing, revealing her sources of inspiration and creative process so you can be empowered to start your own block printing projects at home.
settings.event_description: Jam packed with tips, tricks, inspiration and tours of places I love including my own home, this course gives a real insight in to how I work and how block print can open a world of creativity. You can access all the items you need from our Supplies Store, from lovely eco fabric paints, to tools, items to print and wooden printing blocks. Block printing has changed my life and I hope will bring joy to yours.
